meanings.sent1: I found a few fivers in my pocket and decided to buy some candy.
meanings.sent2: The cashier handed me a handful of fivers as change for my purchase.
meanings.sent3: The fivers in my wallet were having a party, but they couldn't decide what to buy.
meanings.sent4: The fivers in my piggy bank whispered to each other, dreaming of the day they would be spent.
meanings.sent5: The colorful fivers stood out among the other bills, making them easy to spot.

meanings.definition: A group of five people or things.
meanings.sent1: We formed a team of fivers to work on the project together.
meanings.sent2: The fivers lined up in a row, ready to start the race.
meanings.sent3: The fivers at the party all wore matching hats, making them easy to spot.
meanings.sent4: The fivers on the basketball court moved in perfect harmony, like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The fivers in the band played different instruments, creating a beautiful melody together.
